Address.Address1: Property Address 9450 South Thomas Dr.:Check In Address 9900 South Thomas Dr

Description.Text: The pool deck at the Boardwalk is complete with a large zero-entry pool, two hot tubs and a kids-themed Splash Zone that is highlighted with fun fountains for the kids to splash and enjoy and of course, a pool for kids. For the ultimate tan, head up to the Sun Deck for some up close time with the sun. This hot spot is a large deck surrounded by lush palms, keeping you enveloped in a nice cool breeze. No sun worshiper should miss it.To satisfy your hunger, head over to Under the Boardwalk Bar and Grille for fresh seafood, light bites, garden salads and other favorites daily. The Island Breeze Corner Market offers a variety of beach and sundries items, drinks, snacks and pastries. Start the day off with everything from omelets to doughnuts. And no breakfast is complete without fresh Starbucks coffee. Stop in later for Tiki Breeze pizza or ice cream.Guests must have at least one 25 year old in the party to check-in. Please check-in at 9900 South Thomas Dr in Panama City Beach. Upon check-in guest is to pay the following fees-Cleaning fee 1 bedroom- USD 63.07Registration fee- USD 22.52Limited damage waiver fee- USD 40.00. This is a non-refundable fee but covers the room up to USD 2000.00 worth of accidental damages that are reported before check-out.
